title: description
Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg's Lion's Tail: An ohsex mix between the Lion's Tail and the Fairbanks Cocktail. As wild as Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg's freak.

title: notes
Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg's Lion's Tail: Seagram, Bourbon and a hint of party.

title: pairing
Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg's Lion's Tail: Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg have it with a wild Stuffed tomatoes and mille-feuille.

title: serving_suggestion
Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg's Lion's Tail: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the little sounds of California Gurls.
